text: The Supreme Court on Thursday granted Alabama’s request to restore voting restrictions, including efforts that may limit absentee voting during the pandemic. @AdamHSays examines how voter suppression will affect the November election. https://t.co/l8BtD3Totz

text: The coronavirus pandemic is one reason Iowa's sleepy Senate race is suddenly one to watch, @elainejgodfrey writes. https://t.co/4NTIwtyv0h
